expression:
grel:if(and(inArray(['AARGH','Judaica','Middle East','Slavic','Greek','Korean'],cells.Triage.value), not(cells['BIB Heading Before'].value.startsWith('Initials:'))),
cells.Triage.value + if(and(cells.HeadingType.value == "X00",cells.QualifiedAfter.value == false)," - Personal name unqualified after flip","") + ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value.substring(0,7),'Not processed'+ ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value.substring(0,7))
description:
Create column Batch at index 20 based on column Triage using expression grel:if(and(inArray(['AARGH','Judaica','Middle East','Slavic','Greek','Korean'],cells.Triage.value), not(cells['BIB Heading Before'].value.startsWith('Initials:'))),
cells.Triage.value + if(and(cells.HeadingType.value == "X00",cells.QualifiedAfter.value == false)," - Personal name unqualified after flip","") + ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value.substring(0,7),'Not processed'+ ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value.substring(0,7))
